summary: September 1 is the 244th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Gwynfor Richard Evans  was a Welsh politician, lawyer and author. He was President of the Welsh political party Plaid Cymru for thirty six years and was the first Member of Parliament to represent it at Westminster, which he did twice, from 1966 to 1970, and again from 1974 to 1979.
title: Gwynfor Evans
